oracle.pg.rdbms

Class OracleDataLoaderConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.common.OracleFileSplitterConfig
      • oracle.pg.common.OracleDataLoaderConfigBase
        • oracle.pg.rdbms.OracleDataLoaderConfig

  • public class OracleDataLoaderConfig
extends OracleDataLoaderConfigBase
    This class specifies the configuration parameters to use when loading a graph in Oracle Flat-file format using parallel data loader.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OracleDataLoaderConfig()
      Creates a new OracleDataLoader config object with default configuration settings.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OracleDataLoaderConfig

        public OracleDataLoaderConfig()
        Creates a new OracleDataLoader config object with default configuration settings.

    • Method Detail

      • getDirOrSqlldrPath

        public java.lang.String getDirOrSqlldrPath()
        Gets the database directory or SQL loader path to use for parallel data loading. If loading uses external tables, this parameter specifies the database directory where the graph files will be written into in order to be loaded using external tables. For loading using SQL loader, this parameter specifies the path where the sqlldr utility is located

      • getInstance

        public static OracleDataLoaderConfig getInstance()
        Create an OracleDataLoaderConfig with the default settings.

      • getInstance

        public static OracleDataLoaderConfig getInstance(long lVertexSrcOffsetlines,
                                                 long lEdgeSrcOffsetlines,
                                                 long lVertexSrcMaxlines,
                                                 long lEdgeSrcMaxlines,
                                                 long lVertexIDOffset,
                                                 long lEdgeIDOffset,
                                                 int iDop,
                                                 int iPartitions,
                                                 int iOffset,
                                                 DataLoaderListener dll,
                                                 OraclePropertyGraphDataLoader.SPLITTER_TYPE splitterFlag,
                                                 java.lang.String szPrefix,
                                                 java.lang.String szDirOrSqlldrPath,
                                                 boolean bRebuildIndex,
                                                 java.lang.String szTbs,
                                                 java.lang.String szOptions)
        Creates a new OracleDataLoader config object .
        Parameters:
        lVertexSrcOffsetlines - the line offset of vertices. Loading vertices after the offset. Default is 0.
        lEdgeSrcOffsetlines - the line offset of edges. Loading edges after the offset. Default is 0.
        lVertexSrcMaxlines - the max lines of vertices to be loaded. Default is -1 (i.e., load all vertices)
        lEdgeSrcMaxlines - the max lines of edges to be loaded. Default is -1 (i.e., load all edges)
        lVertexIDOffset - the offset of vertex ID. That is, the vertex ID would be vertexID+lVertexIDOffset. Default is 0
        lEdgeIDOffset - the offset of edge ID. That is, the edge ID would be edgeID+lEdgeIDOffset. Default is 0
        iDop - degree of parallelism. It has to be a positive integer.
        iPartitions - number of partitions (i.e., data loading clients)
        iOffset - offset of partitions. It is from 0 to iPartitions-1
        dll - a DataLoaderListener object.
        splitterFlag - the flag to set splitting: REGULARFILE, NAMEDPIPE, PIPEDSTREAM. Default value is REGULARFILE
        szPrefix - the prefix used to generate splitted files for regular file or named pipe based splitting
        szDirOrSqlldrPath - the database directory for external table based loading or the path to sqlldr
        bRebuildIndex - setting the flag to true would disable indexes/constraints on the tables before loading data into the tables, and enable indexes/contraints on the tables after loading data into the tables
        szTbs - tablespace name
        szOptions - the extra options

      • getOptions

        public java.lang.String getOptions()
        Get the additional options for data loading DML and DDL operations
        Returns:
        the database options to use

        public java.lang.String getSplittedFilePrefix()

        Gets the tablespace where the graph tables will be created

      • rebuildIndex

        public boolean rebuildIndex()
        Gets the flag to disable indexes/constraints on the tables before loading data into the tables, and enable indexes/constraints on the tables after loading data into the tables

      • setDirOrSqlldrPath

        public void setDirOrSqlldrPath(java.lang.String szDirOrSqlldrPath)
        Specifies the database directory or SQL loader path to use for parallel data loading. If loading uses external tables, this parameter specifies the database directory where the graph files will be written into in order to be loaded using external tables. For loading using SQL loader, this parameter specifies the path where the sqlldr utility is located

      • setOptions

        public void setOptions(java.lang.String szOptions)
        Set the additional options for data loading DML and DDL operations
        Parameters:
        szOptions - the database options to use

      • setRebuildIndex

        public void setRebuildIndex(boolean rebuildIndex)
        Sets the flag to disable indexes/constraints on the tables before loading data into the tables, and enable indexes/constraints on the tables after loading data into the tables
        Parameters:
        rebuildIndex - setting the flag to true would disable indexes/constraints on the tables before loading data into the tables, and enable indexes/constraints on the tables after loading data into the tables

      • setSplittedFilePrefix

        public void setSplittedFilePrefix(java.lang.String szPrefix)
        Sets the prefix used for splitted files (chunk files)

      • setSplitterFlag

        public void setSplitterFlag(OraclePropertyGraphDataLoader.SPLITTER_TYPE splitterFlag)
        Sets the splitter type to use for data loading

      • setTablespace

        public void setTablespace(java.lang.String szTbs)
        Sets the tablespace where the graph tables will be created
